#labels Featured
#"Family Tree"

Something like this:
{{{
<VBA 1.72> -- <VBA-RR> v19 -- v21 -- v22 -- v23 -- <still active>
                        \
                         -- v20 -- v24-alpha <?>
                                   /
<VBA 1.80b> -- <VBA-M series> -- <VBA-"ReR"> v24 -- <active>
}}}

Version numbers:
* Original series: 1.x.y
* VBA-M: only SVN revision numbers
* VBA-RR: 1.7.2.560 (pre v23.3?), 7.23.y.z (v23.x), 7.24.y.z (v24-alpha)
* VBA-"ReR": 8.24.y.z (z is likely to be 0 due to bugs...)

Note: This might be inaccurate though.
